catalog_info.title: Poets: English Romantic Poets
catalog_info.notes: This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the Core area requirement for Literature and Arts A.
catalog_info.description: Readings in Blake, Baillie, Coleridge, Clare, Wordsworth, Wollstonecraft, Byron, Shelley, Keats, and others. Lyric and narrative forms. Close aesthetic readings linked to thematic considerations. Social and political contexts. Romanticism as an artistic movement and cultural era.
